channel.title: Fortinet cFOS in GKE (Google Cloud) on Hugo for Fortinet TECWorkshops
channel.description: Recent content in Fortinet cFOS in GKE (Google Cloud) on Hugo for Fortinet TECWorkshops

item.title: Chapter 1 - Getting Started
item.description: Fortinet GKE cFOS Workshop Chapter 1 - Provisioning the Google Cloud environment (40min) Provision your Google Cloud Environment, enter your Email address and click Provision Please enter your email address Provision Warning After submitting, this page will return with a blank email address box and no other indications. Provisioning can take several minutes. \*\*\* __PLEASE DO NOT SUBMIT MULTIPLE TIMES__ \*\*\* When provisioning is complete, one of the following will happen.

item.title: Chapter 2 - Create GKE Cluster
item.description: Chapter 2: Create GKE Cluster Tasks Create & Validate VPC Network for GKE Cluster Create GKE Cluster Validate GKE Cluster Enable ‘ipforwarding’ on Worker node

item.title: Chapter 3 - Multus CNI Installation
item.description: Chapter 3 - Install Multus CNI Tasks Install Multus CNI Validate Multus CNI installation Create & Validate net-attach-def for cFOS Create & Validate net-attach-def for application Validate net-attach-def again

item.title: Chapter 4 - Demo application deployment
item.description: Chapter 4 - Create Demo application Tasks Create Demo Application deployment Validate Demo Application deployment

item.title: Chapter 5 - cFOS Installation
item.description: Chapter 5 - cFOS Installation Tasks Create and apply license for cFOS Create & Validate Role and Service Account for cFOS Create & Validate cFOS DaemonSet Check Routing Table and IP Address Validate cFOS license Create configmap for cFOS to configure firewall policy Restart & Validate cFOS DaemonSet Check ping result

item.title: Chapter 6 - Validate Security features
item.description: Chapter 6 - Validate Security features Tasks Perform initial IPS test Perform initial Web Filter test Delete firewall policy using cFOS API Create a POD to update POD source IP to cFOS Perform IPS test for 2nd time Perform Web Filter test for 2nd time Modify Worker Node default CNI Delete current application deployment Create application deployment Perform Web Filter test for 3rd time cFOS REST API to delete firewall policy
